page.title: 16INDUSTRIAL BARROW
page.content: We discovered that Barrow is very much an{Industrial Centre}with a large variety of goods being produced.29 surveys were delivered and 26 surveys given back and we found that Barrow's industry can be divided into 3 parts. {MANUFACTURING}takes{56%}of the market, {SERVICE 33%}and{CONSTRUCTION 11%.}The oldest firm in Barrow is{Redland {Aggregates}which was originally called John Ellis and Sons and began trading in 1830. 15 firms produced goods for the home market, but no firms produced goods entirely for export. 11 firms were already in business before they came to Barrow.{Henson Engineering} makes aerospace components for the{RB {211 Engine}which are used by{Rolls {Royce. Baxter Fell}are precision engineers who make machinery for{North {Sea oil rigs.D.HANDLEY M.SOARS R.BATES {J.BROWN M.BEAUMONT S.WALTON.
